text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Gosh, I've really done it this time.
McQueen's injury seems to be more serious than I thought.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'll be getting a proper diagnosis soon, but it seems I'll have to give 
up on the Takarazuka Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
No need to look so glum. It's unfortunate, but I still have my third 
consecutive win in the Tenno Sho to work toward.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The race means a lot to me, and if I'm to accomplish this feat, I must 
focus on recovery above all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This does mean I'll be unable to train with you, but I'm sure the other 
team members will fill my place.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Our trainer, your teammates—myself included—we all have high 
hopes for you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: So please, show us a race that will light a fire in our hearts.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Okay… I'll run with everything I have.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Anyhow, I'll be fine with just Trainer here. Rice, you'd best get 
back to your training.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah. I'll check in on you again later.

She heads out with determination written on her face. Perhaps she 
was roused by McQueen's words.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
…Seeing her now, I sense a mysterious power. One that will pull us all 
forward.

She's right. Having such a hard worker in their midst has done 
wonders for the rest of the team.
choice_data_list:
Guess that means you can focus on getting 
better.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. I'll need to work just as hard as her if I'm to make a full 
recovery.

Filling the hole left by McQueen's absence brings the entire team 
together in helping Rice train.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep following…

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Okay Rice, start following me now.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Got it. Follow the leader.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant… Rice is so good at this.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hard at work, I see. Looks like her training is a boon to the entire 
team.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You can say that again. My legs are shaking like a newborn goat's.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hey, now that you can't exercise, you better watch that weight. I saw 
those extra helpings of dessert yesterday.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Y-you saw that?! Blame the pudding for being excessively flavorsome! 
I've done nothing wrong!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Desserts aside, Rice is really coming into form.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to you and the others. Y'all being there pushes her to work 
harder.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: If anything, seeing her work so hard gives me strength.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. Welp, I'm gonna go run my heart out. Go lie down or 
something!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hey! …Ugh, she's just rubbing it in because she knows how much I'm 
itching to run again.
With everyone working together, training proceeds smoothly.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ooh… I'm so nervous…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Heh. Learn to revel in this feeling, nerves and all.

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Rice, you've got this! Just think of all the training we did!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah… I worked hard for this. I'm going to have fun, and…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: And get my win against Mihono Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yeah! That's what I like to hear!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: We'll be cheering for you!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Thanks. Okay, well, here goes!
choice_data_list:
Get behind Bourbon, and don't let her get 
away!

Get behind Bourbon, and don't let her get 
away!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Got it! Follow the leader!

I want to win. She last spoke those words to me back on the ferris 
wheel.
Now it's time for her to prove how much she really wants it.
